content:
- 'Description': Explains the origin and transmission methods of the virus.
  'Intent Id': e177f1108f1e4acbb3704d036f
  'Name': Virus Causes
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot Description': The specific virus being discussed.
    'Id': fc44857eef4740d0ae24590879
    'Slot Name': virus_name
  - 'Slot Description': The symptoms caused by the virus.
    'Id': 9634c40511014514b6e40a3c30
    'Slot Name': symptoms
  - 'Slot Description': The ways the virus can be transmitted from person to person.
    'Id': 1f58cb05465a4543bbd0404d06
    'Slot Name': transmission_methods
- 'Description': Discusses the process and logistics of distributing the
    vaccine.
  'Intent Id': ec4f33570995458d81e66900ab
  'Name': Vaccine Distribution
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot Description': The type of vaccine being distributed.
    'Id': 6904a8b07f894af78aa3879c58
    'Slot Name': vaccine_type
    'Possible values':
    - Pfizer-BioNTech
    - Moderna
    - Johnson & Johnson
    - AstraZeneca
  - 'Slot Description': The location where the vaccine is being distributed.
    'Id': 4fcd3f8a7dc242a986821c69b5
    'Slot Name': location
  - 'Slot Description': The population group receiving the vaccine.
    'Id': 8b97727f8b6741edac6cb4f9ff
    'Slot Name': population_group
    'Possible values':
    - healthcare workers
    - older adults
    - essential workers
    - general public
- 'Description': Provides detailed information about the vaccine, its composition,
    and efficacy.
  'Intent Id': 9d985ed3ada442edacb12b2575
  'Name': Vaccine Information
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot Description': The specific vaccine name for the virus.
    'Id': b58bdd5418cc40edaa0a06dd14
    'Slot Name': vaccine_name
  - 'Slot Description': The type of vaccine for the virus.
    'Id': 313edcc285f04cde8e50762cec
    'Slot Name': vaccine_type
    'Possible values':
    - mRNA
    - Viral Vector
    - Protein Subunit
    - Inactivated
  - 'Slot Description': The status of the vaccine for the virus.
    'Id': ffb7bb91d0704fe68b658b29eb
    'Slot Name': vaccine_status
  - 'Slot Description': The specific name of the virus.
    'Id': 45871d5e6fc7433d907e467fbf
    'Slot Name': virus_name
- 'Description': Helps users identify the symptoms associated with the virus.
  'Intent Id': cb32a3594cb6438ca6af1d2d18
  'Name': Symptoms Detection
  'Entity':
  - 'Slot Description': The specific virus or disease for which symptoms are being
      detected.
    'Id': cb59f7c9de4040f285cb6ecfce
    'Slot Name': virus_name
  - 'Slot Description': A symptom that might be associated with the virus or disease.
    'Id': 0762fb91c8064ca2a6da42591d
    'Slot Name': symptom

> ### Follow the following instructions:
>
> You are an intent detection system and I want you to classify an utterance based on the intents in the given above schema. 
>> First, understand its structure: 
> - Each intent comprise of intent ID, intent name and intent description. Each intent has entities associated with them. 
> - Each entity has slot Id,  and entity description. It may also include 'Similar_values': meaning that  Extracted slots may differ from those specified in the schema, but should be similar.
>
> If there are no matching intents for the utterance, respond as {"intents":[{"id":"none", "entities":[]}]}
> Extract all matching entities from the utterance for the selected intent.  If multiple entities are provided, fill all the entities.   If an entity  value is not provided, set the value of the slot to "not applicable".
>
> Generate your response in the following JSON format:
[ 
	{ 
		“intent_id”: “<intent_id1>”, 
		“entity”: [ 
				{“slot_id”: “<slot_id1>”, “slot_value”: “<slot_value1>”}, 
				{“slot_id”: “<slot_id2>”, “slot_value”: “<slot_value2>”} 
		] 
	} 
] 

*What are the travel policies for full time employees in our company for international trips?*
